abstract: General Growth Properties said on Monday that it intends to stick with an investment plan led by Brookfield Asset Management as the cornerstone in its effort to emerge from bankruptcy.
snippet: General Growth Properties said on Monday that it intends to stick with an investment plan led by Brookfield Asset Management as the cornerstone in its effort to emerge from bankruptcy.
lead_paragraph: 4:33 p.m. | Updated General Growth Properties said on Monday that it intended to stick with an investment plan led by Brookfield Asset Management as the cornerstone in its effort to emerge from bankruptcy.

headline.main: General Growth Considers New Simon Offer

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
